item.title: GCP for Spark
My first blog
item.description: Hello World This is my first blog and I want to express something I learned in my graduate year. CMU is a very great place and I could meet many clever and hard-working students in this place. I learn the latest technology and skills in this school, and I also gain many precious experiences here. Spend time wisely I believe I have a good time management skill and I could handle 4 courses in CMU in one semester.

item.title: Spark for ETL
item.description: There is not much information about how could we perform complex operation on pySpark. I summary some tips from stackoverflow and my experience. Hope it will be helpful for you. How to Read JSON to DataFrame print("hello") How to Select Nested entities from DataFrame How to filter Array object with length in Dataframe How to Drop NA How to change Dataframe to RDD How to perform array concat with ReduceByKey
